author: aeryen Z
comment: On new 360 42mm version, have frame around each digit. (October update didn't fix the problem if you wonder)
title: Have display issue

author: Ricardo Contreras
comment: Works really well with the zenwatch!

author: Rahul Roy
comment: I like the principle behind the watch face but on my G Watch it shows up with very narrow boxes around the numerals and some of the lines of the numbers themselves don't resolve very well. The animation sweeps in a circle which takes away from the angularity of the numerals. It would be cool if the ambient mode was black and white but looked like the prism.
title: A cool concept

author: Justin Kaminski
comment: The watch face seem great from the photos, but the face itself on my moto 360 2 does not reflect those Screenshots. The fields housing the digital numbers on the display are artifacted and show as a thin, oddly-shaped box around the numbers. Additionally, the transition from time to date is very jarring. Will download again if it's fixed on the 360 2.
title: Great idea, poor execution
